name: MyABC
0:
”Alexa, start my a. b. c.”
”Alexa, open my a. b. c.”
”Alexa, launch my a. b. c.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my a. b. c.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
My ABC is a fun, simple, and easy-to-use skill that will jump-start learning the English alphabet and beginner words. To make it interesting and engaging, there are animal sounds and rhymes/songs to sing along and learn.

Things you can do with the skill:

The “ALPHABET” feature, as the name suggests, teaches A to Z with a pace that is easy to follow. The 'Alexa, repeat' option can be used at any point to replay.
 
The “WORD” feature lists multiple sets of common words, animal and bird names along with the sounds they make.

The “SONG" feature will play the rhymes. To know the list of songs/rhymes, say “Alexa, list songs”.

The “SPELLING" feature will spell the word. Just say “Alexa, spell world”.

The skill is simple and responsive. You can switch between Alphabet, Songs and Word anytime by just saying “Alexa, alphabet”, “Alexa, song" or “Alexa, word” to initiate the respective feature. 

The friendly helper invoked by saying “Alexa, help” will provide details about the skill and its capabilities. 

Happy listening and happy learning!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
